text: Ama han rôl inringtakin ân ieka: “Amanu hah ânlet zoi! Babylon Roiinpui hah ânlet zoi! Amanu hah atûn chu ramkhoringei le ratha innim ngei omna mun; mitir om jâtngei murdi le vâ innim ngei le ram sâ innim ngei chekinbuolna mun ahongni zoi.18:2: Isa 13:21; 21:9; Jer 50:39; 51:8; Chph 14:8
